content:
Csc Class

Definition

Implements the Csc task. Use the Csc element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see Csc Task.

In this Article

public class Csc : Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler
Inheritance
Object
Task
ToolTask
ToolTaskExtension
ManagedCompiler
Csc

Constructors

Csc()

Initializes a new instance of the Csc class.

public Csc ();

Properties

AllowUnsafeBlocks

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to compile code that uses the unsafe keyword.

public bool AllowUnsafeBlocks { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if will compile code that uses the unsafe keyword; otherwise, false.

Remarks

For more information, see /unsafe (C# Compiler Options).

ApplicationConfiguration

Returns configuration information.

public string ApplicationConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
String

To be added.

BaseAddress

Gets or sets the preferred base address at which to load a DLL.

public string BaseAddress { get; set; }
Value
String

The preferred base address at which to load a DLL.

Remarks

The default base address for a DLL is set by the .NET Framework common language runtime. For more information, see /baseaddress (C# Compiler Options).

CheckForOverflowUnderflow

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the Csc task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.

public bool CheckForOverflowUnderflow { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether true if the Csc task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.

Remarks

For more information, see /checked (C# Compiler Options).

DisabledWarnings

Gets or sets the list of warnings to be disabled.

public string DisabledWarnings { get; set; }
Value
String

The list of warnings to be disabled.

Remarks

For more information, see /nowarn (C# Compiler Options).

DocumentationFile

Gets or sets the XML file to hold the documentation comments.

public string DocumentationFile { get; set; }
Value
String

The XML file to hold the documentation comments.

Remarks

For more information, see /doc (C# Compiler Options).

ErrorEndLocation

If true, outputs the line and column of the end location of each error.

public bool ErrorEndLocation { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

Returns Boolean.

ErrorReport

Gets or sets the method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.

public string ErrorReport { get; set; }
Value
String

The method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.

Remarks

This property can have a value of prompt, send, or none. If the property is set to prompt, you will receive a prompt when an internal compiler error occurs. The prompt lets you send a bug report electronically to Microsoft. If the property is set to send, a bug report is sent automatically. If the property is set to none, the error is reported only in the text output of the compiler. Default is none. For more information, see /errorreport (C# Compiler Options).

GenerateFullPaths

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output (true) or to generate the name of the file in the compiler output (false).

public bool GenerateFullPaths { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the Csc task should generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output; false if the Csc task should generate the name of the file in the compiler output.

Remarks

The default is false. For more information, see /fullpaths (C# Compiler Options).

LangVersion

Gets or sets the version of the language to use.

public string LangVersion { get; set; }
Value
String

The version of the language to use.

Remarks

For more information, see /langversion (C# Compiler Options).

ModuleAssemblyName

Gets or sets an assembly whose non-public types a .netmodule can access.

public string ModuleAssemblyName { get; set; }
Value
String

An assembly whose non-public types a .netmodule can access.

Remarks

For more information, see /moduleassemblyname (C# Compiler Option).

NoStandardLib

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the Csc task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll, which defines the entire System namespace.

public bool NoStandardLib { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the Csc task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll; otherwise, false.

Remarks

Use this property if you want to define or create your own System namespace and objects. For more information, see /nostdlib (C# Compiler Options).

PdbFile

Gets or sets the path of the .pdb file.

public string PdbFile { get; set; }
Value
String

The path of the .pdb file.

Remarks

For more information, see /pdb (C# Compiler Options).

PreferredUILang

The name of the language passed to the “/preferreduilang” compiler option.

public string PreferredUILang { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the name of the language.

Remarks

If set to null, “/preferreduilang” is omitted and the compiler uses its default setting.

ToolName

Returns the name of the Csc tool (csc.exe).

protected override string ToolName { get; }
Value
String

The name of the Csc tool (csc.exe).

UseHostCompilerIfAvailable

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the Csc task should use the in-process compiler object, if available.

public bool UseHostCompilerIfAvailable { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the Csc task should use the in-process compiler object, if available; otherwise, false.

Remarks

Used only by Visual Studio.

WarningLevel

Gets or sets the warning level for the compiler to display.

public int WarningLevel { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The warning level for the compiler to display.

Remarks

For more information, see /warn (C# Compiler Options).

WarningsAsErrors

Gets or sets a list of warnings to treat as errors.

public string WarningsAsErrors { get; set; }
Value
String

The list of warnings to treat as errors.

Remarks

For more information, see /warnaserror (C# Compiler Options).

WarningsNotAsErrors

Gets or sets a list of warnings that are not treated as errors.

public string WarningsNotAsErrors { get; set; }
Value
String

The list of warnings that are not treated as errors.

Remarks

For more information, see /warnaserror (C# Compiler Options).

Methods

AddResponseFileCommands(CommandLineBuilderExtension)

Fills the specified commandLine parameter with switches and other information that can go into a response file.

protected override void AddResponseFileCommands (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension commandLine);
Parameters
commandLine
CommandLineBuilderExtension

Command line builder to add arguments to.

CallHostObjectToExecute()

Compiles the project through the host object.

protected override bool CallHostObjectToExecute ();
Returns
Boolean

true if compilation succeeded; otherwise, false.

Remarks

This method will get called during execution if a host object was passed to the Csc task.

GenerateFullPathToTool()

Returns the full file path of the Csc tool.

protected override string GenerateFullPathToTool ();
Returns
String

The full file path of the Csc tool.

InitializeHostObject()

Returns a host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

protected override Microsoft.Build.Utilities.HostObjectInitializationStatus InitializeHostObject ();
Returns
HostObjectInitializationStatus

A host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.

Remarks

This method will get called during execution of this task if a host object was passed to the Csc task.
